<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby- Bit Blogs App
</h1>

This is the complete code for my app Bit Blogs, which is a blog website

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Clone or download the copy from this repo**

    ```shell
    git clone git@github.com:mdfaizan7/gatsby-fictious-blog-app
    ```

2.  **Install Dependencies**

    ```shell
    cd bit_blogs
    npm install --save
    ```

    if you are using yarn...

    ```shell
    cd bit_blogs
    yarn install
    ```

3)  **Launch Project ðŸš€**

    ```shell
    gatsby develop
    ```

    Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!
